usefulItems: quiche pan (10 in.), rolling pin, oven
title: Quiche Lorraine

ingredients.content: 2 oz Gruyère cheese, cut into pieces (optional)
3 oz unsalted butter, cold and cut into pieces, plus extra to grease
6 all-purpose flour, plus extra to dust

preparations.content: Place Gruyère into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease and flour a quiche pan (10 in.) and set aside.
Place 6 oz flour, 3 oz butter, salt and water into mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Remove pastry from mixing bowl and form into a ball.
Roll pastry on a lightly floured surface, with a rolling pin. Line prepared quiche pan with the pastry, prick with a fork to avoid air bubbles and set aside.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with a mixed salad for a main course.
Bacon is salty, therefore use salt sparingly or to taste.
To substitute bacon with cubed ham or Canadian bacon: add 0.5 oz of cooking oil and remove measuring cup while sautéing. Proceed as directed by the recipe.

<b>Vegetarian quiche<b>: instead of bacon cubes, use sun-dried tomatoes preserved in oil. Omit bacon, drain tomatoes and cut into small cubes before placing onto pastry and covering with egg mixture. Proceed as directed by the recipe.
